{"templates": {"default": (90,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (2, 2), size = (130, 86), png = 4), # index 4 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryText(pos = (140, 2), size = (750, 26), font=0, color=0x3faaff, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1), # index 1 is the Title MultiContentEntryText(pos = (150, 35), size = (450, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 5), # index 5 is the Published Date MultiContentEntryText(pos = (150, 62), size = (450, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 6), # index 6 is the Views Count MultiContentEntryText(pos = (600, 35), size = (300, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 7), # index 7 is the duration MultiContentEntryText(pos = (600, 62), size = (300, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 8), # index 8 is the ratingcount ]), "state": (90,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 5), size = (880, 28), font=2, color=0x3faaff, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 37), size = (880, 46), font=3, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1), # index 2 is the description ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 23),gFont("Regular", 18),gFont("Regular", 26),gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 90 }
